params.deadline: Unix timestamp for auto-release (0 = no deadline)
params.seller: Address to receive funds on release

params.releaseToSeller: True = seller wins, False = buyer wins

refundEscrow(uint256).notice: Refund escrow to buyer (seller only, or buyer after deadline)

releaseEscrow(uint256).notice: Release escrow funds to seller (buyer only)
